content: उपकॢप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be fit for; तत्रेदमुपकल्पते <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--2@} To be prepared or ready (at hand); आसनेषूपकॢप्तेषु <ls>Ms. 3. 208</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 333.</ls> {@--3@} To result in, serve as, lead to (with <ab>dat.</ab>); वार्यपि श्रद्धया दत्तमक्षयायोपकल्पते <ls>Ms. 3. 202.</ls> {@--4@} To become, take a (particular) form or shape. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To prepare, get ready, equip; रथं <ls>Ve. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To appoint, assign, allot; उपकल्पितं पशुं <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; <ls>U. 2</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 109.</ls> {@--3@} To vow, promise; देवतोपकल्पित <ls>Pt. 4.</ls> {@--4@} To set up, exhibit. {@--5@} To render (homage), communicate. {@--6@} To bring near, fetch. {@--7@} To assume, take.
